purpose: Enable employees to request company-approved devices through a self-service Power App, triggering approval workflows and integrating with internal policies.

mvp_components.app_details: A self-service app for employees to browse and request devices.

app_screens.screen_details: Allows users to browse available devices, view specs, photos, and availability, and filter by department-approved models.
Form for selecting a device, justifying business need, selecting urgency level, and auto-populating employee details from Azure AD.
Allows employees to view the status of their requests and receive email notifications at each step. Optional Power BI dashboard for tracking.

mvp_components.flow_details: Workflow to manage the approval process for device requests.

flow_actions.action_details: Manager receives a notification for a new approval request.
Manager can approve or reject the request with comments within a 2 business day SLA.
IT Administrators can update stock levels and mark orders as fulfilled. Integration with procurement systems like SAP.

post_mvp_modules.details: Add a screen to the app for employees to view the status of their requests and receive email notifications at each step. Optional Power BI dashboard for tracking.
post_mvp_modules.recommendation: Extend the existing CanvasApp to include a new screen for request tracking. This will keep the user experience consistent and centralized. A Power BI dashboard can be integrated for detailed tracking and reporting.

post_mvp_modules.details: Extend the existing workflow to allow IT Administrators to update stock levels and mark orders as fulfilled. Integrate with procurement systems like SAP for inventory management.
post_mvp_modules.recommendation: Use Power Automate to extend the workflow capabilities for inventory management. This will automate the stock updates and order fulfillment process, and integration with systems like SAP will ensure data consistency.

integration_points: Integration with Azure AD for auto-populating employee details
Integration with procurement system (e.g., SAP) for inventory management (Post-MVP)
notes: The MVP focuses on enabling employees to request devices and managers to approve those requests. Post-MVP features will add tracking and inventory management capabilities.
